data.name: Don't Get Tagged
data.detailed_description:
Overview

Play through 20 levels of difficult puzzles, enemies and obstacles within their respected zones, Let nothing get in your way and get to the goal! Just don't get tagged in the process.

Gameplay

This game is an isometric top down point and click strategy game focused on your movement, placement and exciting movement.

Features

  • 20 Levels to play.
  • Two zones with unique environments.
  • Three difficulties modes.

Behind the project

Hello my name is Lewis and this is indeed my first game. This project has been an entire learning experience and have been working on it for over an year and has been my passion project of mine. This is only a stepping stone and hope to do bigger and better projects in the future.

data.short_description: Escape the Bobber occupied levels by doing puzzles and strategic movement through levels. Experience a variety of levels and challenges through out your play through, overcoming obstacles and those that block your path completely. Just don't get tagged In the processes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/8/7
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
